entry.def: Interdisciplinary means involving more than one academic subject.

example.ex: ...interdisciplinary courses combining psychology, philosophy and linguistics.
example.tran: 综合了心理学、哲学与语言学的跨学科课程

means.word_mean: 1. drawing from or characterized by participation of two or more fields of study;
